department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: Let the students understand the design and development of computer architecture
goal.ch: 讓學生了解計算機結構之原理與發展

content.en:
“Fundamentals of Computer Design
Instruction Set Principles and Pipelining
Advanced Pipelining and Instruction Level Parallelism (ILP)
Scoreboard, Tomasulo
Branch Prediction
Memory Hierarchy, Cache
Virtual Memory
I/O, Storage
Multi-Processers“
content.ch:
“Fundamentals of Computer Design
Instruction Set Principles and Pipelining
Advanced Pipelining and Instruction Level Parallelism (ILP)
Scoreboard, Tomasulo
Branch Prediction
Memory Hierarchy, Cache
Virtual Memory
I/O, Storage
Multi-Processers“

textbook.en:
“J. L. Hennessy and D. A. Patterson, Computer Architecture: A Quantitative Approach, fourth Edition, Morgan Kaufmann Publishing Co.
D. A. Patterson and J. L. Hennessy , Computer Organization ＆ Design: The hardware/software interface, Morgan Kaufmann Publishing Co.“
textbook.ch:
“J. L. Hennessy and D. A. Patterson, Computer Architecture: A Quantitative Approach, fourth Edition, Morgan Kaufmann Publishing Co.
D. A. Patterson and J. L. Hennessy , Computer Organization ＆ Design: The hardware/software interface, Morgan Kaufmann Publishing Co.“

grading.en:
15％ Quiz and Class Participation
28％ Mid-term1
28％ Mid-term2
29％ Final Examination
grading.ch:
15％ Quiz and Class Participation
28％ Mid-term1
28％ Mid-term2
29％ Final Examination

domain.en: 資安、網路、資料庫與系統研究群
domain.ch: 資安、網路、資料庫與系統研究群

ch.competency: 發掘、分析及處理問題的能力
創新及獨立思考之能力
溝通協調與團隊合作能力
洞察資訊技術潮流與國際趨勢
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 專案規畫與管理之能力
終身學習與自我成長之能力

en: Department:MSc in Computer Science and Information Engineering、Institute of Software Engineering、Master‘s Program in Artificial Intelligence, Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering、PhD in Computer Science and Information Engineering only.
Department:Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
Department:International Graduate Program in Artificial Intelligence only.
Department:Interdisciplinary Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
ch: 系所:限資訊工程學系碩士班、資訊工程學系軟體工程碩士班、資訊工程學系AI碩士班、資訊工程學系博士班。
系所:限資訊工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限人工智慧國際碩士學位學程。
系所:限資訊電機學院學士班。年級:限三年級、四年級。
